Claim: "Computer models of doom are just predictions and not facts."
Implication: "We should not trust these computer models of doom."
Referring expressions: Computer models, doom, predictions, facts  These computer models, doom
Formula: (exists c (exists a (IsPrediction(c) and ~IsDoom(a)))) -> (exists e (exists a (IsTrustworthy(e) and ~IsDoom(a))))
